name: Jam Stuffed Croissants
description: A favourite at parties! A perfect combination of savoury and sweet. Better than store-bought, these can be prepared in advance and frozen. Simply freeze uncooked on a Sheet Pan; once frozen, place in freezer bags and bake when ready.
preparation: Roll puff pastry into a thin 10.5” square. Gently flip onto large side of an Appy Maker. Using a rolling pin, firmly roll over to cut pastry.
Spoon 1 tbsp jam onto each triangle, top with a slice of brie, and sprinkle with nuts, if desired.
Starting at wide end, roll up each triangle on the Appy Maker, and form into crescents.
Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Brush with milk, if desired, and bake until golden brown, 14–16 minutes.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
